root: ^Hey, I know when someone is troubled just by the look of their eyes. Need help?
^Have you seen the Elder by any chance?
^Now that you mention it.. I think I saw him near the river
^Ah that makes everything much easier. Thank you, I’ll get going then!
^Don’t be so hasty now young one. He instructed that no child should be allowed outside the village until reparations are complete
^But I won’t take long! Besides the river is right next to the village
^Rules are rules and they are not meant to be broken. When the festival takes place tomorrow, you’ll be able to go far and wide and explore to your heart’s content
^Fine.. I’ll stay at home.. *Mumble* As If!
